title: AutoML Agent
description: An AI agent that automates the full machine learning pipeline, from data preprocessing to model training, evaluation, and selection, enabling quick experimentation with datasets.
summary: The AutoML Agent allows users to upload datasets or select preloaded sample datasets, preprocesses the data, trains multiple ML models, evaluates performance, generates EDA charts, and selects the best-performing model. It includes a Streamlit dashboard for dataset management, progress monitoring, and result visualization.

title: Research Scraper & Summarizer Agent
description: An AI agent that autonomously searches, scrapes, and summarizes information from multiple websites, generating concise insights for a given research topic.
summary: The Research Scraper & Summarizer Agent takes a user-provided topic, decides how to search online, scrapes content from multiple sources, summarizes it using AI models, and saves a structured report. It integrates a clean agent architecture and uses real-world industry tools.
